title: Entertainment Live: New Batmobile; Hunger Games trailer; Clueless turns 20 and more - BBC News
summary: composer and big band leader james last dies .
dame evelyn glennie receives polar prize .
the new batmobile is officially unveiled .

documents.title: so long , farewell
text: that 's all we 've got time for on today 's entertainment live page , but we 'll be back tomorrow with heaps more from the world of entertainment and the arts .
in the meantime , we 'll leave you with this gem , which needs very little introduction .
take a kids ' dance troupe , mix in some aretha franklin and you get more than three million hits in two days .
author: Sarah Jane Griffiths
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: chris pratt is having a good time
text: we spoke to jurassic world star chris pratt a couple of weeks ago while he was doing the rounds promoting the dinosaur adventure .
having been in two of the three highest-grossing films of 2014 - guardians of the galaxy and the lego movie - we asked him if he was starting to feel the pressure of delivering the goods .
he gave a ty chris pratt response :
i think if i was smarter i 'd feel pressure , but i just do n't .
i 'm just kinda having a good time .
i probably should feel pressure - maybe i 'll start nah !
if jurassic world gets a sequel , that will be three movie franchises he 'll be committed to - so does he feel tied down ?
i definitely feel i 'm glad to have work , and glad to have good work .
i 've yet to go sell a movie that i did n't absolutely love .
i 'm very lucky jurassic world - much like guardians of the galaxy or the lego movie - has a magic and energy i 'm getting off people that just really , really love it .
so it still feels really exciting to me .
you can read what he had to say about jurassic world , and see what happened when we challenged pratt to an arm wrestle , on the site tomorrow .

documents.title: fifty shades fall-out
text: in other fifty shades of grey-themed news today , the film 's screenwriter has revealed she 's yet to sit down and watch the film .
speaking on
she discussed how she and the book 's writer el james had gone back and forth discussing what to keep and what to ditch .
`` i do n't see it out of any kind of bitterness or anger or anything like that .
i just do n't feel like i can watch it without feeling some pain about how different it is to what i initially wrote . ''
el james ' husband niall leonard is thought to be writing the screenplay for the sequel , fifty shades darker , due in 2017 .

documents.title: all aboard
text: scottish comedian billy connolly 's turning trainspotter for his new documentary series .
he 'll be travelling 8,000 miles by train across 28 us states for itv show billy connolly 's tracks across america .

the trip , which will start and finish in new york , will take him through mountains , desert and swamp from north dakota to louisiana , seeking out `` interesting characters who capture the spirit of the country '' .
he 'll also be regaling viewers with tales of the outlaws and stars who have travelled along the same tracks .
it follows his 2011 series billy connolly 's route 66 .

documents.title: jurassic world : the critics react
text: the reviews are in for the fourth jurassic park instalment , jurassic world , and it seems to be a thumbs up from most critics .
the film stars chris pratt and bryce dallas howard ( below ) and is directed by colin trevorrow ( safety not guaranteed ) with steven spielberg as executive producer .
the guardian 's film critic peter bradshaw
it
variety 's scott foundas found pratt `` effortlessly engaging '' ,
the independent 's geoffrey macnab
it 's in cinemas tomorrow - when we 'll also publish our feature on the film .

documents.title: 'first celebrity chef ' patten dies
text: cookery writer and wartime broadcaster marguerite patten - widely considered to have been the first celebrity chef - has died aged 99 .

long before the uk was drooling over food from the likes of jamie oliver or nigella lawson , mrs patten ( below left ) fronted her first tv cookery show on the bbc in 1947 , telling the country how to make the most of its rations during world war two .
she wrote more than 170 books and achieved worldwide sales of more than 17 million copies .
her family said she died on 4 june `` from an illness stoically borne '' .

documents.title: leaked ! the movie ( or song or book or script )
text: so with the mystery of the missing fifty shades book still baffling investigators , we had a look at some of the other big projects that have leaked ahead of schedule .

documents.title: lego sorry for 'window licker ' toy
text: lego has apologised for describing one of its new toys as a `` window-licker '' .
the toy , called turg , was described on lego 's website as looking like `` an experiment that 's gone very , very wrong '' .
mental health charities called the phrase `` highly offensive '' .
author: BBC Newsbeat
Radio 1 and 1Xtra

documents.title: shoes : pleasure or pain ?
text: anyone whose feet have ever been left blistered and throbbing with pain at the end of a long day or night in crippling heels will identify with the title of the v & a 's new exhibition , shoes : pleasure and pain .

the show , which opens this saturday 13 june , takes a closer look at the extremes of footwear from around the globe , presenting around 200 pairs including the parakeet shoes by caroline groves ( above ) , and the wedding toe-knob paduka from india in the 1800s ( below ) .
the exhibition ponders the cultural significance and transformative capacity of shoes , as well as the latest footwear technology .
more details are on the

documents.title: spotify milestone
text: not to be outdone with the announcement of apple radio , music streaming service spotify has announced it has reached a new milestone .
it now has 20 million subscribers and more than 75 million users of its free service .
ten million of the paid subscribers signed up in the last year , which is an average of one new subscriber every three seconds .

documents.title: foals album : 'coming soon '
text: the return of foals now seems imminent , after the band posted a short

it contains scenes of the band in what looks like a rehearsal room and features just a few seconds of music , which seems to suggest a slightly heavier direction for the follow up to 2013 's holy fire .
the oxford band have been teasing fans on their instagram account for several months now , with that appear to have been taken during the recording of the album .

documents.title: second hand clobber
text: she has a wardrobe fit to make little girls across the world green with envy - and now you can own one of harper lee beckham 's dresses .

twenty-five `` specially curated outfits '' , pulled together by her celebrity mum victoria beckham and including items from designers such as chloe , ralph lauren , stella mccartney , gucci and marc jacobs , have been made available to buy as part of save the children 's fashion saves lives sale .
the sale takes place at the mary 's living & giving shop for save the children in primrose hill , london - from 10:00 bst on thursday 18 june .
all money raised will go towards save the children 's work to end child deaths from preventable causes by 2030 .

documents.title: george ezra 's first million ( albums )
text: george ezra 's debut album wanted on voyage has broken the one million sales barrier in the uk .
according to the official charts company , 1.007 million copies have been sold since its release 11 months ago .
`` selling a million albums almost does n't feel real , '' said ezra , `` i do n't actually think i 've ever seen a million of anything . ''
wanted on voyage - which features hits budapest and blame it on me - has spent more than a year in the top 10 .
author: Official Charts Company

documents.title: clueless turns 20
text: can you believe it 's been 20 years since the release of clueless ?
or that reese witherspoon was in the running for the role of cher ?
to celebrate the important milestone , vanity fair has published `` the definitive oral history of how clueless became an iconic 90s classic '' .

it features interviews with producers and stars revealing how the film was cast ( sarah michelle gellar also missed out on a part ) and some excellent behind-the-scenes photos like these ( above ) of a very young alicia silverstone ( cher ) and paul rudd ( josh ) .
next , we examine whether or not paul rudd is an ageless vampire .
seriously .
what is his secret of eternal youth ?

documents.title: family fortunes 'on a break '
text: family fortunes fans will have to do without the show for a while , as itv is putting the format on a break .
it 's nearly a decade since the 80s show was revived as celebrity spin-off all star family fortunes , with host vernon kay .
an itv spokesman called family fortunes `` an old favourite '' , adding : `` we have n't got any episodes scheduled at present but we definitely will be seeing it back very soon . ''
author: Broadcast

documents.title: degrassi is saved
text: canadian school drama degrassi has already had several incarnations - from the kids of degrassi street , degrassi junior high and degrassi high during the late 70s and 80s , through to the more recent degrassi : the next generation .

now after teennick announced it was cancelling the show after 14 seasons , netflix has stepped in to save the tv franchise with 20 new episodes -renamed degrassi : next class - planned for early 2016 , according to entertainment weekly .
netflix us
netflix
degrassi graduates to netflix .
meet the next class , coming in 2016
stars to come out of the series include rapper drake , nina dobrev from the vampire diaries and 90210 's shenae grimes .
no word yet on whether the new episodes will be aired in the uk .
degrassi graduates to netflix .

documents.title: legendary literary line-up
text: its a who 's who of literature at this year 's edinburgh book festival .
louis de bernieres , joanne harris , david mitchell , irvine welsh plus man booker prize winners ben okri and howard jacobson and pulitzer prize winner jane smiley .
crime writer val mcdermid will discuss her new novel with scotland 's first minister nicola sturgeon while cressida cowell will launch the last in her how to train your dragon series .
comedians julian clary and danny wallace will both present their first children 's books .
author: The Bookseller

documents.title: work in progress
text: everybody knows the hassle of getting your house ready if you have people coming to stay a for a few days .
but if you have 175,000 people camping in your ( albeit pretty massive ) front garden , then the preparations are a bit more intense .

documents.title: jaden smith 's 'psychedelic ' new role
text: multi-tasking young actor and musician jaden smith - the son of will smith and jada pinkett smith - has been cast in baz luhrmann 's new netflix drama the get down .

the show is set in 1970s new york and features a crew of wild south bronx teenagers which includes smith as marcus `` dizzee '' kipling - `` a psychedelically talented and enigmatic graffiti writer '' .
luhrmann revealed smith - who starred alongside dad will in the universally-panned after earth - is already hard at work .

`` he has begun developing his the get down skill set , even taking lessons from the legendary graffiti artist lady pink of 'wild style ' fame , as well as steeping himself in the history and culture of the bronx , '' said luhrmann .
author: Deadline

documents.title: the movie music of james last
text: you may not have recognised the name but you will recognise his music .
the band leader and composer james last has died at the age of 86 .
here are some of his songs which were used in movies :

documents.title: and sliiiiiiiiiide
text: some art leaves you giddy with excitement , carsten holler 's new interactive installations at the hayward gallery in london just leaves you dizzy .
isometric slides are two huge helter skelter slides down the outside of the building , while two flying machines offer people a bird 's eye view of the south bank .
but is it art ?
the telegraph

documents.title: james last dies , aged 86
text: composer and big band leader james last has died at home in florida , his manager has said .
the 86-year-old became seriously ill in september but announced and played his final tour in march and april this year .
he 's thought to have sold in excess of 100m albums worldwide .

documents.title: mumford and son or daughter
text: the pregnancy rumour mill is in overdrive again , with reports actress carey mulligan and her singer husband marcus mumford are expecting their first baby .
according to e ! , the dead giveaway was the floor-length red gown she wore to sunday night 's tony awards which `` flaunted her growing baby bump '' .
mumford and sons are playing a gig in columbia , south carolina later .
will marcus dedicate a song ?
we humbly suggest babe ( l ) .

documents.title: evelyn glennie receives polar prize
text: congratulations to scots percussionist dame evelyn glennie who has been presented with the polar music prize by king carl xvi of sweden , alongside country music star emmylou harris .
the musician , who has been deaf since the age of 12 , described the award - considered music 's version of the nobel prize - as `` important and symbolic '' .
dame evelyn performed at the opening ceremony of the london 2012 olym

documents.title: hero boxer to boxing superhero
text: she has wiped the floor with her opponents , now boxing champion and olympic bronze medallist mary kom is going to wipe the floor with bad guys as india 's first female cartoon superhero .
the boxer has apparently signed a deal with screenyug creations that will see a fictional childhood version of the national hero in mary kom jr .
according to screenyug 's ashish kulkarni : `` she 's between eight and ten years old , and gets powers when she wears her boxing gloves . ''
the television series will be aired sometime in 2016 .

documents.title: the end is nigh for the hunger games
text: it wo n't be in cinemas till november , but the first trailer for the final hunger games film has been revealed online - and it features plenty of fighting talk from katniss everdeen , played by jennifer lawrence .
the first look at the hunger games : mockingjay part 2 shows her gearing up to lead the rebel districts in a final assault on the capitol and president snow ( as well as a wedding , below ) .
`` snow has to pay for what he 's done , '' says katniss .
`` we all have one enemy .
he corrupts everyone and everything .
`` he turns the best of us against each other tonight , turn your weapons to the capitol . ''

documents.title: fifty shades mystery
text: the manuscript of el james 's new fifty shades of grey novel has apparently been nicked a week head of its release .
police are investigating amid fears that copies could be sold on the black market .
the timing is so unfortunate , it could have come straight out of the pages of a thriller - or maybe a press release .
or are we being cynical ?
author: The Daily Mail

documents.title: strictly no more dancing
text: dermot o'leary might be on strictly come dancing judge craig revel-horwood 's wish list but the former x factor host has ruled out appearing on the next series .
despite recently dancing for 24 hours for comic relief , o'leary told
`` i wo n't be going on strictly , '' said o'leary .
`` they have two very good hosts and it 's a brilliant show .
`` i still have the x factor in my blood - i love the show , so i 'd never be a competitor on strictly . ''

documents.title: tony bennett gets the flu
text: after all the excitement of being photographed with prince harry on monday night , veteran singer tony bennett had to cancel last night 's second sold-out show with lady gaga at the royal albert hall , because of a flu virus .
the pair were set to perform tracks from their grammy award-winning jazz album cheek to cheek .
tony bennett
itstonybennett
sorry to not be singing in london tonight .
i love my fans in the uk and appreciate all the well wishes to get over this flu quickly .
bennett 's publicists dismissed rumours the 88-year-old had a heart attack , insisting he just has a virus and has nearly lost his voice .
lady gaga also rushed to reassure fans on twitter .
lady gaga
ladygaga
hey everybody !
do n't worry about tony , he 's ok !
that 's just showbiz sometimes .
we 'll catch u next time , we got you !
critics in both the guardian and the telegraph gave monday night 's performance four stars .
anyone who had tickets will be contacted by ticket outlets with more information soon .

gaga did n't waste her evening though - she headed into soho to cause paparazzi mayhem outside ronnie scott 's jazz club , and it was later revealed by fans on twitter the singer even sang a tune or two .

documents.title: the big reveal : it 's the batmobile !
text: wonder what jeremy clarkson is making of this car ?
it 's the new batmobile which will be driven by ben affleck in the upcoming batman vs superman : dawn of justice .

it 's definitely got elements of christian bale 's tumbler vehicle from christopher nolan 's movies , but has retained some of the sleek shape of the armoured vehicle from tim burton 's batman , starring michael keaton .
either way it 's kind of badass .
one question though - where is the petrol cap and why do you never see batman filling her up at a supermarket forecourt ?
let us know what you think of it .

documents.title: get involved
text: we always like to hear your views on today 's news so please get in touch .
tweet @ twitterid or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning !
text: welcome to wednesday 's entertainment live page , where we 'll be keeping you up to date with all of today 's entertainment and arts news .
coming up find out why tony bennett and lady gaga cancelled their london show , we hear from jurassic world 's chris pratt and the latest batmobile is unveiled .
author: Sarah Jane Griffiths
Entertainment reporter
